title: India AI Summit 2026 Day 5 LIVE: India to formally join U.S. led effort on AI, supply chain security-Pax Silica today
content:
Here are 3 bullet points summarizing the headline:

*   India will formally join a U.S.-led initiative.
*   This effort focuses on cooperation in artificial intelligence (AI) and supply chain security.
*   The announcement was made at the India AI Summit 2026.

title: Petitions filed in Patna High Court challenging election of several MLAs, court issues notices
content:
Here's the summary in 3 bullet points:

*   Petitions have been filed in the Patna High Court.
*   These petitions challenge the election victories of several Members of Legislative Assembly (MLAs).
*   The High Court has responded by issuing notices regarding the challenges.

title: Proceedings for road project to be completed in a time-bound manner: Minister
content:
Here are 3 bullet points summarizing the headline:

*   Administrative proceedings for a road project are currently underway.
*   These proceedings are mandated to be completed within a specific, time-bound manner.
*   This directive for timely completion has been issued by a Minister.

title: Karat slams Indo-US trade agreement
content:
Karat has strongly criticized the trade agreement between India and the United States.
*   The headline indicates significant opposition or denouncement of the deal by Karat.
*   This suggests potential political or public disagreement regarding the Indo-US trade pact.

title: CM Stalin sends book to Kerala student
content:
CM Stalin, the Chief Minister, is involved in an action.
*   He sent a book as the item.
*   The recipient is a student located in Kerala.

title: SC reserves for judgment Duraisamy-Stalin 2011 election dispute
content:
The Supreme Court has concluded hearings on an election dispute.
*   The court has reserved its judgment in the case, meaning a verdict will be delivered later.
*   The dispute involves Duraisamy and Stalin and stems from the 2011 elections.

title: Travel operators seek road tax relief, rollback of 3% cess in pre-Budget memorandum
content:
Here's the summary in 3 bullet points:

*   Travel operators have submitted a pre-Budget memorandum to the government.
*   They are requesting relief from existing road taxes.
*   Another key demand is the rollback of the 3% cess.

content:
The Chief Minister (CM)
*   Highlighted the government's various initiatives.
*   These initiatives are focused on providing public services online.

title: Ponniyathangam festival draws crowds, praise from Chief Minister
content:
The Ponniyathangam festival recently took place.
*   The event successfully attracted large crowds of attendees.
*   It received praise and positive recognition from the Chief Minister.

title: Bengaluru doctor booked for alleged defamatory social media posts on Nandini products
content:
A doctor in Bengaluru has been booked by authorities.
*   The booking is for allegedly posting defamatory content on social media.
*   The posts in question were critical of Nandini dairy products.
